Hank.Action: Tallying bags on a clipboard carefully and efficiently at the feed mill.
Fumbles with his watch while checking the time.
Prepares to leave work promptly at noon, showing awareness of schedule.
Wishes Happy New Year to Butler as he leaves, showing politeness and friendliness.
Greets Linda and her child warmly on the street, acknowledging them by name.
Waves back at Carl Jenkins, the town policeman, who greets him warmly.
Steps aside to let a little girl on a sled pass, showing consideration.

Walks purposefully through the town, greeting acquaintances politely and navigating the rundown environment confidently.
Stops to let a little girl on a sled pass silently and respectfully, showing social awareness and consideration.

No verbal communication with wife, but offers towel and support nonverbally, indicating emotional intelligence and situational awareness.

Shivers in his overcoat, showing physical discomfort but no action to remedy it.
